claim: OpenCode server instances must not be shared across different worktrees; default is one server per active worktree.
Dashboard events stream is append-only; consumers should treat event payloads as extensible.
`/v1/events` supports replay via `replayLast` with default and max clamping; non-numeric values fall back to default.
Ralph persists control-plane events to JSONL and deletes logs older than 14 days by default (configurable).
